headline: QCLN: High Valuations In The Clean Tech Rally
summary: QCLN offers growth in semiconductors and EVs but faces valuation concerns and underperformance vs. peers. See why CNRG may be a better choice.

headline: Enovix Appoints Veteran Semiconductor Leader J. Daniel “Dan” McCranie to its Board of Directors
summary: FREMONT, Calif., Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Enovix Corporation (Nasdaq: ENVX, ENVXW) (“Company” or “Enovix”), a leader in advanced silicon battery technology, today announced the appointment of J. Daniel “Dan” McCranie to its Board of Directors (the “Board”), effective August 12, 2025. This appointment expands the Board to eight directors, six of whom are independent. McCranie brings more than three decades of public-company board governance and operating leadership across the semiconduct

headline: ON Semiconductor: The Same Old Battle Between Present And Future
summary: ON Semiconductor Corporation struggles with margin pressure and weak results. Click for why, with fair value estimates dropping, ON stock is maintained at Hold.

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Find Risky
summary: Many investors pay attention to mid-cap stocks because they have established business models and expansive market opportunities. However, their paths to becoming $100 billion corporations are ripe with competition, ranging from giants with vast resources to agile upstarts eager to disrupt the status quo.
